no... you have to change your xorg.conf file

you will need to find your max and min screen resolutions for each monitor. Same with the refresh rates. to get those you can search all over the place or you can do this command with one monitor hooked up then do the other monitor: sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg
your xorg.conf file is in /etc/X11/xorg.conf
